title: Playdate
description_full: The application can be viewed on the live site.  Feature tests can be run using a local instance of the application as described in the github documentation.  User stories to define features are stored and organized in the project management tool Pivotal Tracker.
tech: Github | Heroku | Ruby on Rails, Cucumber, Rspec | SemaphoreCI, Coveralls | Pivotal Tracker

title: The 'Cooper Test'
description_short: Evaluating and visually displaying running fitness metrics.
